tests.name: 00-simple - allocates memory and avoids errors

tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '05-realloc-as-free - realloc acts as free with size=0'

tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '06-realloc-smaller - realloc moves the contents when reassigning it'

tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '07-realloc-moves - realloc moves the contents when reassigning it'

tests.run: ./test -w NoTests '09-coalescing-in-middle - Coalescing in the middle of a segment'
